list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment:
All done for Signup and Verify Email Feature,
How to using it :
1. POST data to http://localhost:4000/signup, the params =
{ "email" : "indrawanjonmuhamad@yahoo.com", "password" : "123akadsj23" }
2. Open your email and click the link
3. The return of the endpoint if success will be return { result : true } and neither { result : false } (The GET endpoint [ http://localhost:3000/verification/5df91c8a285afa1b196fb6e1 ] )
4. if return True the statusAccount on your account in Admins collection will be change to true, it will be like this : { "_id":"5df917ff26`09d2125d3d7172", "email":"indrawanjonmuhamad@yahoo.com", "password":"123akadsj23", "statusAccount":true }

task.summary: Fixed MongoClient Connection Error, but get 'undefined' and 3 Warnings
Separate Backend service into 2 Microservices ( Admin & Client ) Services
Separate Backend service into 2 Microservices ( Admin & Client ) Services (2)

Create select leader function in Client_Backend,
Endpoint = "http://localhost:5000/select_leader"
POST Data =
{ "code" : "5533", "select_leader" : "3", "event_id" : "5d4" }

All done for Signup and Verify Email Feature,
How to using it :
1. POST data to http://localhost:4000/signup, the params =
{ "email" : "indrawanjonmuhamad@yahoo.com", "password" : "123akadsj23" }
2. Open your email and click the link
3. The return of the endpoint if success will be return { result : true } and neither { result : false } (The GET endpoint [ http://localhost:3000/verification/5df91c8a285afa1b196fb6e1 ] )
4. if return True the statusAccount on your account in Admins collection will be change to true, it will be like this : { "_id":"5df917ff2609d2125d3d7172", "email":"indrawanjonmuhamad@yahoo.com", "password":"123akadsj23", "statusAccount":true }

MESSAGE.value: Fixed MongoClient Connection Error, but get 'undefined' and 3 Warnings
Fixed MongoClient Connection Error, but get 'undefined'
Separate Backend service into 2 Microservices ( Admin & Client ) Services

Create select leader function in Client_Backend,
Endpoint = "http://localhost:5000/select_leader"
POST Data =
{ "code" : "5533", "select_leader" : "3", "event_id" : "5d4" }

4. if return True the statusAccount on your account in Admins collection will be change to true, it will be like this : { "_id":"5df917ff2609d2125d3d7172", "email":"indrawanjonmuhamad@yahoo.com", "password":"123akadsj23", "statusAccount":true }
